title: Harriet Lefton Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Harriet Lefton? Check out all of Harriet Lefton's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogHarriet Lefton Investor Insights Manager Harriet Lefton Originally from the U.K., Harriet began her career as a journalist specializing in the niche world of metal markets. Now she has turned her attention to financial blogging, using Similarweb's unique digital data to generate valuable investing insights. She graduated from the University of Cambridge and is also a qualified U.K. lawyer. Harriet authors our Investor Newsletter. Sign up here.
